description: Simple self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: List each clump of phi(n) numbers (starting from phi(2) = 1) in reverse order.
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
maple: ReverseNextPhi_n_elements_permutation(30); with(numtheory,phi); ReverseNextPhi_n_elements_permutation := proc(u) local m,a,n,k,i; a := []; k := 0; for n from 2 to u do m := k + phi(n); for i from 1 to phi(n) do a := [op(a),m]; m := m-1; k := k+1; od; od; RETURN(a); end;
crossrefs: Maps fractions between A020652/A020653 and A020653/A020652.
author: Antti Karttunen
